meanings.sent1: The cake was multilayer with different flavors in each level.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a multilayer painting with various colors and textures.
meanings.sent3: The multilayer sandwich was so tall that it almost touched the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a multilayered cake, revealing new aspects with each interaction.
meanings.sent5: The multilayered clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.sent1: The soil in the garden was multilayer, rich in nutrients and minerals.
meanings.sent2: The archaeological site revealed a multilayer history of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The multilayered lasagna was so delicious that it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a multilayer structure, touching on various topics seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multilayered rock formations in the canyon were a sight to behold.
